Title: GOCR: Multiple Vulnerabilities
Synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in GOCR, the worst of which could lead to arbitrary code execution.

Background.Text: GOCR is an OCR (Optical Character Recognition) program, developed under the GNU Public License. It converts scanned images of text back to text files.

Description.Text: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in GOCR. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

Impact.Text: Please review the referenced CVE identifiers for details.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: Gentoo has discontinued support for GOCR. We recommend that users unmerge it:
